thread.title: 14 unintentionally funny road signs

author: Ali Gray
title: 14 unintentionally funny road signs
text: Long car journeys can be excruciatingly boring. So when an amusing road signs pops up, it can be a very welcome distraction. An opportunity for cheap laughs? We’ll take it. Read on for a selection of some of the most LOL-worthy road signs. Happy motoring. You’ve got to wonder what goes on down that street. Anyone fancy a detour? Photo: Alamy We missed this on the Hollywood stars’ homes tour. Photo: Rex We’d advise taking a right at the T-junction. Photo: Getty Proof that roads can have identity crises. Photo: Alamy Perhaps you should flip a coin? Photo: Rex When you’re really desperate to find a parking spot… Photo: Getty The homes are nice but the neighbours aren’t the best. Photo: Alamy She’s more of a pushbike kind of girl. Photo: Shutterstock We have reason to believe your sat nav is plotting against you. Photo: Rex One of the more generic service station signs. Photo: Getty Well, at least they have beds there. Photo: Getty When you absolutely must meet the mandatory sign quota… Photo: Alamy Something tells us this could be a trick. Photo: Getty Turn left, you have so much to live for! Photo: Getty Spend more time laughing and less time worrying behind the wheel. With the AA on your side, you're covered when the unpredictable happens. Find out more at theaa.com
